channel.title: Cache never downloads in the right spots
channel.description: Whenever i try to play a rsps, the cache never downloads in the right spot, and i always get " connection error - retrying in x seconds " Anybody know why?

item.title: Cache never downloads in the right spots
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“thuqs range, post:3, topic:441640”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=544333.msg3990043#msg3990043 date=1336444277]
are you refreshing the page/ reloading the client in the middle of the cache being downloaded?

Thats all i can think of…try clearing all your cache, then trying it again.
[/quote]

Nope… all it does is just start up, then goes straight to error connection no matter what client / server it is.[/quote]
Hmmm. It might be a virus protection or a firewall blocking it, I’d check that out too.

Read full topic
item.source: Cache never downloads in the right spots
